name: NPR
text: The state House and Senate both approved legislation to remove the 126-year-old current flag and to form a commission to redesign it. https://t.co/s1y58Vj4uc

name: NPR
text: Stefan Lynch was raised by gay parents in the early eighties. Even in the face of the terrible sickness and loss caused by AIDS, their community of "aunties" showed him how to survive and care for one another. @StoryCorps https://t.co/4WXygsFyEk
